content.raw:
Glad to hear you worked it out.

For future reference, the last line on the commands I wrote above (`. install/setup.bash`) is very important, it tells ROS to use the new from source installation for the current shell. If you want that installation to work for every new shell, you must add that line to your bashrc:

`echo "source <path>/install/setup.bash" >> ~/.bashrc`
content.html:
Glad to hear you worked it out.

For future reference, the last line on the commands I wrote above (. install/setup.bash) is very important, it tells ROS to use the new from source installation for the current shell. If you want that installation to work for every new shell, you must add that line to your bashrc:

echo "source <path>/install/setup.bash" >> ~/.bashrc
